post:
Hello!

**<a href="http://gatsby.im">Gatsby</a> is a WordPress backed blogging platform for knowledgable individuals who wish to host their websites on a high performance network <u>dedicated</u> to user satisfaction.**

Currently in beta, Gatsby is powered by <a href="http://cdn77.com">CDN77</a> and Constant.com's <a href="http://www.constant.com/cloud/storage/">S3 object storage</a>, as well as <a href="https://clientarea.ramnode.com/aff.php?aff=096">RamNode</a>, to provide a truely scalable service, ready to handle heavy traffic.
Due to the aggressive optimisation in place, most text-heavy blogs should load in <u>less</u> than **500ms** under load.

Also, I'm planning on a few <strong>prize giveaways</strong> for active Gatsby users - Domains, Premium themes, all fun stuff :)

**Why Gatsby?**

- Bloomin' fast
- Powered by <a href="http://cdn77.com">CDN77</a>
- Content stored on <a href="http://www.constant.com/cloud/storage/">Constant's</a> reliable and fault tolerant S3 service
- _Easily bring your own domain name_
- Optional Enhanced security via <a href="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zMabEyrtPRg&noredirect=1">Google's Two-Step Authentication</a>
- Dedicated to <a href="http://gatsby.uservoice.com/">user satisfaction</a>
- Free
	


**Free?**

Yes, the ultra-fast service you're signing up to now will always be free.
Premium services and features will be added in time, however the core of the service must be perfected before that happens :)



**Anything you should know about?**

Presuming that most won't read the Terms of Service, the TL;DR version is as follows:
- Content must comply with US law
- _Seriously_, it must comply with US law



**So, what now?**

Still interested? Head over to <a href="http://gatsby.im">Gatsby.im</a> and get going now.
As this is an open beta, I'm incredibly interested in your thoughts, opinions, and suggestions for improvement- only through your feedback will Gatsby become the best place to host your blogs.
Not interested? Ah well, have a great day!


<strong><a href="http://gatsby.im">Sign up, Free &rarr;</a></strong>
